calculations.name: Selected Metric Value
calculations.tableau_expression:
CASE [Parameters].[Select Metric]
WHEN "Likes" THEN SUM([Likes_Received_Per_Day])
WHEN "Posts" THEN SUM([Posts_Per_Day])
WHEN "Messages" THEN SUM([Messages_Sent_Per_Day])
END

calculation_context.Expression:
CASE [Parameters].[Select Metric]
WHEN "Likes" THEN SUM([Likes_Received_Per_Day])
